channel.title: Products – Underdog Solutions
channel.description: Bespoke IT and AV solutions for companies and private individuals.

item.title: VHS to DVD – Digital service
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description:
We have a great service to transfer your old VHS tapes to DVD. Our specialised process enhances the picture quality to the best that it can be, using compression algorithms to fit each VHS on one DVD. If the tapes are in good condition this process happens in real time. We charge £27 per 240…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
We have a great service to transfer your old VHS tapes to DVD. Our specialised process enhances the picture quality to the best that it can be, using compression algorithms to fit each VHS on one DVD. If the tapes are in good condition this process happens in real time. We charge £27 per 240 min VHS tape. Each additional DVD copy is £10 you may add this using the “additional copy” button within our store.

Please bear in mind if tapes are in very poor condition i.e. have mould on them, this will take a significantly longer time as cleaning is a more time consuming process, it will also involve additional cost. We cannot guarantee that the tape will be fully restored. Although we will do our best to create the best Audio and Video quality for you. Even if your tapes are broken let us try to fix them for you, again this will be at an additional cost dependant on how broken the VHS is.

item.title: Additional copies – Digital service
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: This is an add-on to either our DVD or USB to digital copies and costs £10 per additional copy.
item.content:encoded: This is an add-on to either our DVD or USB to digital copies and costs £10 per additional copy.

item.title: VHS to USB – Digital service
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description:
We have a great service to transfer your old VHS tapes to USB. Our specialised process enhances the picture quality to the best that it can be. If the tapes are in good condition this process happens in real time. Please bear in mind if tapes are in very poor condition i.e. have mould on…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
We have a great service to transfer your old VHS tapes to USB. Our specialised process enhances the picture quality to the best that it can be. If the tapes are in good condition this process happens in real time.

Please bear in mind if tapes are in very poor condition i.e. have mould on them, this will take a significantly longer amount of time as cleaning is a more time consuming process, it will also involve additional cost.  We cannot guarantee that the tape will be fully restored.  Although we will do our best to create the best Audio and Video quality for you.  Even if your tapes are broken let us try to fix them for you, again this will be at an additional cost dependant on how broken the VHS is.

VHS to USB service is £40.50 (for each 240 min VHS tape to USB key) each additional USB key copy is £10.  Use the additional copy button within our online store to add this feature.

item.title: On-site IT or AV assistance (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: On-site assistance for any IT issues that need in person presence, i.e hardware upgrades.   Can’t get the PC/ laptop to turn on? Having issues with your TV/ Hi-Fi/ home cinema/ CCTV system?   Let us know what’s wrong and we will take a look at fixing the issue!
item.content:encoded:
On-site assistance for any IT issues that need in person presence, i.e hardware upgrades.

 

Can’t get the PC/ laptop to turn on?

Having issues with your TV/ Hi-Fi/ home cinema/ CCTV system?

 

Let us know what’s wrong and we will take a look at fixing the issue!

item.title: IT/ Audio Visual Advice – I.e. What to buy
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: Hop on a Zoom/ Brave call with me, where I’ll spend an hour with you to help you achieve your goals.   Thinking of buying: or upgrading a new laptop/ PC? a new Hi-Fi/ speakers? a home cinema upgrade?   Lets have a chat and see what options are available to you.
item.content:encoded:
Hop on a Zoom/ Brave call with me, where I’ll spend an hour with you to help you achieve your goals.

 

Thinking of buying:

or upgrading a new laptop/ PC?

a new Hi-Fi/ speakers?

a home cinema upgrade?

 

Lets have a chat and see what options are available to you.

item.title: Beginners IT tuition (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description:
Are you scared of hitting the wrong button?  Just starting out in the world of IT?  It’s never too late to start! If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far). I can then assist you and show you how to use…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
Are you scared of hitting the wrong button?  Just starting out in the world of IT?  It’s never too late to start!

If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far).

I can then assist you and show you how to use various software and navigate around the OS of your choice, be that Apple Mac, Apple iOS on phones/ tablets, Windows (any version) or even Linux.  It may be that you now have the time and money to invest in learning, IT can be a fun creative and rewarding hobby!

item.title: Intermediate IT tutoring (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved. It may be Website creation, or just general getting to grips Microsoft Office or a new OS.
item.content:encoded: If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved.  It may be Website creation, or just general getting to grips Microsoft Office or a new OS.

item.title: Advanced IT tutoring (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: If you need help with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved. It may be Website creation, programming or other software related issues. Let me know what you need to improve on.
item.content:encoded: If you need help with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved.  It may be Website creation, programming or other software related issues.  Let me know what you need to improve on.

item.title: Remote assistance (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.content:encoded: This is for remote assistance via one of our remote software(s) to fix software related issues on your PC.  Multiple hours can be purchased.
